title: Understanding Jaquese's Interests
text: Consider how Jaquese's interest in superheroes can be used as a tool to engage him in subjects he finds challenging.

title: Engagement in Math and Science
text: Think about strategies that can keep Jaquese engaged in math and science, given his advanced skills in these subjects.

title: Social Interaction Opportunities
text: Reflect on how you can create opportunities for Jaquese to interact with his peers in a positive way.

hintAnswer: Get to know the student $$-$$ Use Jaquese’s interest in superheroes to teach reading and writing.
title: Using Interests to Teach
text: How can Jaquese's interest in superheroes be used to improve his reading and writing skills?
choices: Get to know the student $$-$$ Use Jaquese’s interest in superheroes to teach reading and writing.
Get to know the student $$-$$ Use Jaquese’s interest in superheroes to teach math and science.

hintAnswer: Provide individualized supports $$--$$ to keep Jaquese engaged during math and science instruction.
title: Individualized Supports
text: What kind of supports can be provided to keep Jaquese engaged during math and science instruction?
choices: Provide individualized supports $$--$$ to keep Jaquese engaged during math and science instruction.
Provide group activities to keep Jaquese engaged during math and science instruction.

hintAnswer: Create social opportunities $$-$$ Because Jaquese wants to interact with peers, create situations that make it easier for him to do so appropriately.
title: Creating Social Opportunities
text: How can you create situations that make it easier for Jaquese to interact with his peers appropriately?
choices: Create social opportunities $$-$$ Because Jaquese wants to interact with peers, create situations that make it easier for him to do so appropriately.
Create social opportunities $$-$$ assign students to Jaquese to force them to interact.
